title: User Login Success
description: Verify that users can log in successfully with valid credentials and are redirected to their role-specific dashboard.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page
Enter a valid email and password
Click the login button
Ensure user is authenticated and redirected to the correct dashboard based on role (User, Admin, Super Admin)

title: User Login Failure with Invalid Credentials
description: Verify the system rejects login attempts with invalid credentials and displays appropriate error messages.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page
Enter an invalid email or password
Click the login button
Verify login is denied and an error message is displayed notifying wrong credentials

title: Password Recovery Process
description: Verify the password recovery workflow sends recovery instructions to registered email and allows password reset.

steps.description: Navigate to the password recovery page
Enter a registered email address
Submit the recovery request
Confirm that a recovery email is sent
Follow the recovery link and reset the password
Verify user can log in using the new password

title: Role-Based Access Control Enforced
description: Verify that access to features and pages is restricted based on user roles: User, Admin, and Super Admin.

steps.description: Log in as a normal User
Attempt to access Admin and Super Admin dashboard pages
Confirm access is denied or redirected to user-appropriate pages
Log in as Admin user
Attempt to access Super Admin pages
Confirm access is denied for Super Admin functionalities

title: Task Creation and Categorization
description: Verify that users can create tasks with appropriate categorization, deadlines, and initial status.

steps.description: Navigate to the task creation interface
Input task details including title, description, category, deadline, and status
Submit the new task
Verify the task appears in the task list with correct details and category

title: Task Status Update Workflow
description: Verify that tasks can be updated with status changes to In Progress, Completed, and Overdue, and visual indicators are updated accordingly.

steps.description: Open an existing task
Change its status to In Progress
Save changes
Confirm status change and corresponding visual indicator update
Repeat status update to Completed and Overdue
Ensure each status change reflects correctly with visual markers and deadline logic

title: Drag-and-Drop Task Reordering
description: Verify that users can reorder tasks using drag-and-drop with @dnd-kit and the order persists after reload.

steps.description: Navigate to the task list in Kanban or table view
Use drag-and-drop to reorder tasks
Confirm that tasks visually reorder as expected
Refresh the page
Verify that the new task order is maintained

title: Academic Management CRUD Operations
description: Verify creation, update, and deletion of academic entities including courses, routines, teachers, study materials, and lecture slides.

steps.description: Create a new course with associated teacher and section
Confirm course appears in course list
Edit the course details
Verify updates are correctly saved and reflected
Upload study materials and lecture slides linked to the course
Confirm uploaded materials are accessible and properly organized
Delete the created course and materials
Verify deletion removes all associated records cleanly

title: Bulk Import for Courses and Teachers
description: Verify that bulk import of courses and teachers works correctly, with error handling for invalid or duplicate entries.

steps.description: Navigate to bulk import interface for courses
Upload a valid bulk file with multiple courses
Confirm all valid records are imported successfully
Upload a bulk file with invalid and duplicate entries
Verify proper error messages shown and invalid entries rejected

title: Announcement Creation and Filtering
description: Verify announcements can be created, edited, and filtered by user sections accurately.

steps.description: Create an announcement with text and assign to one or multiple sections
Confirm announcement appears in announcement list
Edit the announcement content and section assignments
Verify updates are visible
Apply section filters on the announcement list
Confirm only announcements for selected sections are displayed

title: Admin Dashboard Analytics and User Management
description: Verify that the admin dashboard displays real-time user statistics, visual analytics, and allows role changes and user deletion.

steps.description: Access admin dashboard
Verify statistical data and graphs loaded correctly with Chart.js visualizations
Navigate to user management section
Promote a user to Admin role and demote back
Confirm changes are persisted and reflected in role-based access
Delete a user
Verify the user is removed and dashboard reflects updated user count

title: Super Admin Full System Control and Audit Logs
description: Verify that Super Admin can access full system analytics, manage admin users, view audit logs, and configure system settings.

steps.description: Log in as Super Admin
Access system-wide analytics and review metrics
Verify analytics data is comprehensive and accurately displayed
Create a new Admin user
Confirm new Admin user appears in admin management list
Access audit logs and verify recent system activities are logged
Confirm audit logs are detailed and accessible
Modify system-wide settings
Verify changes are applied and system behavior reflects settings

title: Notification System Delivery and Display
description: Verify push notifications via Capacitor and Firebase, as well as in-app alerts for deadlines and announcements are triggered and received correctly across platforms.

steps.description: Trigger a deadline notification for a task
Confirm user receives push notification on supported devices
Trigger an announcement notification
Verify in-app alert is displayed immediately
Test notification reception in offline and online states
Confirm notifications are received when device reconnects

title: Side Navigation Responsiveness and Functionality
description: Verify side navigation menus collapse/expand properly and are responsive on desktop, tablet, and mobile devices.

steps.description: Open the app on desktop screen size
Interact with side navigation to collapse and expand menus
Verify menus collapse and expand smoothly with correct items shown
Resize viewport to tablet and mobile sizes
Confirm side navigation adapts responsiveness and toggles mobile menu visibility appropriately

title: Search and Filtering Functionality Across Modules
description: Verify search and filtering capabilities work correctly on tasks, courses, and study materials with accurate results.

steps.description: Input search keywords in task search
Verify task list updates to display matching results
Filter courses by teacher and section
Confirm course list reflects the selected filter options
Search study materials by title or course
Verify materials list shows only relevant items

title: Performance Test: Lazy Loading and Virtualized Lists
description: Verify that large data sets load efficiently using lazy loading, client-side caching, and virtualization to maintain UI responsiveness.

steps.description: Load task lists, academic content, and admin dashboards with large datasets
Verify UI loads incrementally (lazy loading) and remains responsive without freezes
Scroll through lists with many items
Confirm virtualization techniques render visible items only to optimize performance
Reload content to verify client-side caching is effective
Ensure cached data displays promptly without unnecessary network calls

title: Offline Support and Data Synchronization
description: Verify that the application supports offline usage and syncs data properly when connection is restored.

steps.description: Simulate offline mode and perform task creation and editing
Confirm new or updated tasks are saved locally without errors
Restore internet connectivity
Verify that offline changes synchronize with the backend and appear to other users

title: Security Validation: Data Privacy and Environment Protection
description: Verify that sensitive data is protected, environment variables are secure, and backend access is regulated through Supabase RLS policies.

steps.description: Attempt to access data outside authorized user permissions
Confirm access is denied per Role-Level Security policies
Inspect environment config files for hardcoded sensitive information
Ensure environment variables are stored securely and not exposed in client bundles
Simulate common security attacks (e.g. SQL injection, XSS) on input forms
Verify protection mechanisms successfully prevent security breaches

title: UI Smooth Animations and Accessibility
description: Verify UI animations are smooth using Framer Motion and the interface meets accessibility standards across devices.

steps.description: Navigate through different UI components to trigger animations
Confirm animations are smooth and free from lag or jitter
Test UI elements with keyboard navigation and screen readers
Ensure all interactive elements are reachable and readable, meeting WCAG guidelines

title: Validation of Deadline Visual Indicators
description: Verify that deadlines in tasks show correct visual indicators for upcoming, overdue, and completed statuses.

steps.description: Create tasks with future, todayâ€™s, and past deadlines
Confirm each deadline is visually distinct according to status: upcoming, due today, or overdue
Mark tasks as completed
Verify completed tasks show appropriate visual indicators, overriding deadline status if necessary
